name: The Secret Base
description:
This is my first game,i made it in 6 monts
I’m from Romania and i need to learn more english because i have a lot of mistakes:)
YOU CAN CONTACT ME AT THIS EMAIL : YriusGames@gmail.com

If you download the SETUP you need to wait until the antivirus will scan the file,after antivirus scanned the file you need to open it again :)))
VERY IMPORTANT : because a signature certificate cost 83$ /year my game SETUP have an unknown publisher so you need to click on run anyway to run the game 

MY WEBSITE :(no longer active,i payed 30$ for it because i was too young that times)
